name: Raymond PETTY, Respondent, v. GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner

parties: Raymond PETTY, Respondent, v. GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner.

opinions.text: AND NOW, this 12th day of September, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby granted, but limited to the following: Whether the lower court erred in granting Respondent’s Motion to Vacate, Set Aside and Strike the Award of Arbitrators?

attorneys: Philip D. Priore, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
682 A.2d 291
Raymond PETTY, Respondent, v. GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner.
No. 0058 E.D. Allocatur Docket 1996.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 12, 1996.
Philip D. Priore, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
